Replace.Text: All cities have no War Weariness. Every campus in the conquered city will bring[ICON_TechBoosted]Eureka; and every Theater Square will bring[ICON_CivicBoosted]Inspiration, the city will not lose[ICON_Citizen]population, and +1[ICON_Amenities]satisfaction and +4 loyalty everyturn. A city that has garrison +3 loyalty everyturn, if the garrison is legion or army, +5 loyalty. Defeat enemy units at the borad of enemy city will cause the city lose 20 loyalty; If the civilization is in Golden age or Heroic Age, lose 40 loyalty instead.[NEWLINE]Every unit acquire 1 combat strength and not effect by damage; 4 extra combat strength while facing barbarian. Military units can move after promotion or attack. every military unit acquire 1 extra Combat Strength ; everytime you control 6 Encampment acquire an extra military policy slot（up to 4.[NEWLINE]When a unit is killed, reward[ICON_Gold]gold equals to 33% of the combat strength ,[ICON_Science]science and[ICON_Culture]culture; If the unit comes from previous age then double the rewards.[NEWLINE]Every units acquire resistance to[ICON_Nuclear][ICON_ThermoNuclear]nuclear explosion damage and immune[ICON_Resource_Uranium]nuclear radiation damage.[NEWLINE][ICON_Power]Buildings that have extra yield will have 4 extra yield when city has enough power acquire.

When capital population reach 3/5/8/13/21 receive a soybean flour bread, which is a luxury resource. The production of capital[ICON_Production]bonuses can be overlayed. Intensity military facility out, land and support unit garrsion at fort will let tiles gain +1[ICON_Culture]culture and +1[ICON_Production]production.[NEWLINE]At the beginning of each turn, 10% of production[ICON_Production]transfer into[ICON_Science]science and[ICON_Culture]culture;[ICON_Gold]10% of gold transfer into[ICON_Food]food everyturn.[NEWLINE]after be declared of war +100%[ICON_Production]production within 12 turns, all unit+3[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength and +2[ICON_Movement]movement.[NEWLINE]Stop providing city defence after technology steel working has been developed, allow to build LV4 city wall instead, allow use gold to purchase any city walls.

While dispersing barbarian outpost, you will gain Tribal village bonuses and experience.[ICON_TechBoosted]Eureka and[ICON_CivicBoosted]Inspiration provide 66%[ICON_Science]Science and Culture cost for researching technologies and civics. When entering a new era and a wonder were built, gain an radnom[ICON_TechBoosted]eureka and[ICON_CivicBoosted]Inspiration. All cities are settled with an extra City Center building, which will be the building that has the lowest porduction cost.

At the begin of each turn, stop deducting production and acquire equals to 12 % of turn production.[NEWLINE]Allow declare Liberation War atfer Defensive tactics; after Military Training has been researched, allow declare War of Territorial Expansion.[NEWLINE]After declare war acquire[ICON_Production]production add-n within 12 turns, diminishing effect.

When capital population reach 3/5/8/13/21 receive a soybean flour bread, which is a luxury resource. The production of capital[ICON_Production]bonuses can be overlayed. Intensity military facility out, land and support unit garrsion at fort will let tiles gain +1[ICON_Culture]culture and +1[ICON_Production]production.[NEWLINE]At the beginning of each turn, 10% of production[ICON_Production]transfer into[ICON_Science]science and[ICON_Culture]culture;[ICON_Gold]10% of gold transfer into[ICON_Food]food everyturn.[NEWLINE]after be declared of war +100%[ICON_Production]production within 12 turns, all unit+3[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength and +2[ICON_Movement]movement.[NEWLINE]Stop providing city defence after technology steel working has been developed, allow to build LV4 city wall instead, allow use gold to purchase any city walls.

At the beginning of the game born in ocean tiles; unlock“Sailing”and“Shipbuilding”technology, unlock the ability to enter ocean tiles. Unit ignore[ICON_Movement]movement penalty from embarking and disembarking. Allow all navy melee unit doing Coast Raid.[NEWLINE]Acquire a free builder after settle the first city, and the citty +1[ICON_Citizen]population. Before settale the first city +2[ICON_Science]science and+2[ICON_Culture]culture everyturn. Avoid damage by flood.

When a civilization has been defeated, trigger[ICON_TechBoosted]eureka of all tecnology that the civilization has researched and trigger[ICON_CivicBoosted]Inspiration for same. When build[ICON_TradeRoute]trade route with more advanced civilizations, gain[ICON_Science]science or[ICON_Culture]culture.[ICON_TradeRoute]Trade route come from other countries +2[ICON_Science]science,[ICON_Culture]culture,[ICON_Production]production,[ICON_Faith]faith and[ICON_Gold]gold.[NEWLINE]If capital has been settled, additional settler transfer into builder. But the output of capital can be overlayed, +100% Territorial Expansion speed, allow to build an extra district when the population reaches district restrict population+1, after unlock the match technology can build buildings that can provide different resources.[NEWLINE]The loyalty pressure of capital will increase with era.[NEWLINE]Ignore technology requirment, show[ICON_Resource_Uranium]uranium.

Like civilization that have strong force, and try to align with them to avoid war. Dislike civilization that is weak. Try to create large amount of army and legion, respect like-minded civilization. Dislike civilization that can't create army and legion or leave army unused. Will summon army from City-states. Like civilization who also use City-states arm, Dislike civilization to be noncommittal about mercenaries. [NEWLINE]Sympathy for the barbarian. Dislike civilization who dispersing barbarian outpost.

Hate the entire world.[NEWLINE]Like civilization war between each other, believe in long-term war. Always managed to maintain a strong standing army. respect other civilization that own strong arms.[NEWLINE]Dislike barbarian. Like civilization that disperse barbarian outpost. Hate civilization who ignore barbarian outpost.
Yatogami Tōka trait unit, replace rocket launcher. Can launch nuclear bomb.[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength increase while defensing.
Yatogami Tōka trait unit, replace Giant Death Robot. Allow launching nuclear bombs.[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength increase while defencing.
Yatogami Tenka trait unit, replace rocket launcher. Can launch nuclear bomb.[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength increase while attacking.
Yatogami Tenka traitunit, replace giant death robot. Allow launching nuclear bomb.[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength increase while attacking.
Dea Tohka trait unit, promotion from Sword of the End or Sword of Demise. Allow launching nuclear bombs.[ICON_Strength]Combat Strength increase while attacking or defencing.

Yatogami trait building.[NEWLINE]Automaticly transfer[ICON_Resource_Uranium]uranium into[ICON_Power]power, provide power to cities within 12 tile. No carbon dioxide emissions, no nuclear accidents.[NEWLINE]When a city with a molten salt reactor conducts a nuclear weapons-related program or produces nuclear weapons+50%[ICON_Production]production.

Yatogami trait building.[NEWLINE]provide wall circle around City center and Encampement. Wall allow City center and Encampment District doing[ICON_Ranged]ranged attack, before attacking the city, the Wall must be destoryed. acquire“保藏”市政後提供1[ICON_Tourism]tourism.
Yatogami trait building.[NEWLINE]增加你的外部防御力. acquire“保藏”市政後provide 2[ICON_Tourism]tourism.
Yatogami traitbuilding.[NEWLINE]再次提升你的外部防御能力. acquire“保藏”市政後提供3[ICON_Tourism]tourism.
Yatogami trait building.[NEWLINE]提升你的外部防御能力至最佳水平. acquire“保藏”市政後提供5[ICON_Tourism]tourism, golden age provide extra 5[ICON_Tourism]tourism.

除役此城市当前使用的发电厂, replace it with {LOC_BUILDING_YATOGAMI_ADVANCED_REACTOR_NAME}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_YATOGAMI_ADVANCED_REACTOR_NAME}：[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_YATOGAMI_ADVANCED_REACTOR_DESCRIPTION}
A expensive building that provide1[ICON_RESOURCE_IRON]steel each turn.
制造合金是一门与人类本身一样古老的艺术——在人们定居城市之前, 他们已经掌握了一些铸造青铜的知识. 铁的神奇特性被发现後, 提纯和合金化金属的秘诀就更加珍贵了. 熟练的铁匠和冶金学家甚至可以使用最不纯的矿石样品.
由于人类理解马既是坐骑又是役畜的价值, 育种导致马的力量, 速度和美丽的增加. 随着岁月的流逝, 马变得更好, 更高贵, 更有价值.
An expensive building that provide 1[ICON_RESOURCE_NITER]niter every turn.

Alchemy can be considered the precursor of modern chemistry, the art of combining scientific method with occult knowledge and astrology. Although the alchemists never succeeded in achieving any of their highest goals (converting lead into gold and granting humans immortality), their experiments paved the way for future scientific advances.

Before humans learned to mine coal from the ground, they managed to pyrolyze wood, which means heating it without oxygen to produce charcoal. Although charcoal burners are almost as old as metallurgy itself, specialized stills were developed around the 18th century to meet the needs of the new industry, but their use was abandoned about a century later due to the widespread use of cheaper and more efficient stone coal..
一旦工程师了解原油在液体燃料生产中的价值, 他们就开始寻找替代品. 有多种方法可以实现这1点——从液化煤到精炼生物燃料, 虽然通常这个过程不如原油那样有效, 但可以帮助一个面临燃料危机的国家.
An expensive building that provide 1 1[ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM]every turn.
矿产期货市场满足全球对稀土金属的须求, 用于生产电子产品, 发动机和civilization机器中的其他有用零件.
An expensive building that provide 1[ICON_Resource_Uranium]uranium every turn.
开采放射性矿物只是将它们用作燃料或武器的第一步. 它们还需要在将它们置于这种情况下以生成所需同位素或该同位素需要离心和精制的过程中进行富集.
A expensive building that provide 2[ICON_RESOURCE_OIL]oil everyturn.
一旦工程师了解原油在液体燃料生产中的价值, 他们就开始寻找替代品. 有多种方法可以实现这1点——从液化煤到精炼生物燃料, 虽然通常这个过程不如原油那样有效, 但可以帮助一个面临燃料危机的国家.
An expensive building that provide 2[ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM]Aluminum everyturn.
矿产期货市场满足全球对稀土金属的须求, 用于生产电子产品, 发动机和civilization机器中的其他有用零件.
